name: part_009
file: tmp_【 #夏色まつり誕生祭2025 】重大告知あり！アイドル革命進行中！～今日の主役は夢の途中～　【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [L-XVS13TRTI]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performing 'Kirameki Rider☆' on stage.

subtitles.original: 甘い毒めいた言い逃れ
subtitles.english: Sweet poison-like excuses.

subtitles.original: いいの？ 拗ねた気持ちは
subtitles.english: Is it okay? My sulking feelings.

subtitles.original: 君との相性診断
subtitles.english: Our compatibility diagnosis.

subtitles.original: 星占いなら So good So good
subtitles.english: If it's horoscopes, it's So good, So good.

subtitles.original: 友達なんかじゃないよ
subtitles.english: We're not just friends.

subtitles.original: ときめいてる
subtitles.english: My heart is throbbing.

subtitles.original: キミにFall in love 恋のSOS
subtitles.english: Falling in love with you, SOS of love.

subtitles.original: ずっと胸が苦しいんです ハヤクRescue
subtitles.english: My chest has been aching, quickly Rescue me.

subtitles.original: 「好き」のテレパシーに早く気づいて！
subtitles.english: Notice my telepathy of 'love' quickly!

subtitles.original: これはFall in love 恋のSOS
subtitles.english: This is falling in love, SOS of love.

subtitles.original: もっとキミに近づきたい
subtitles.english: I want to get closer to you.

subtitles.original: 終わらせて 片想いMy heart
subtitles.english: End this unrequited love, My heart,

subtitles.original: 全部抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embrace it all.

subtitles.original: キミが好きな音楽や
subtitles.english: The music that you like,

subtitles.original: 映画のことリサーチして
subtitles.english: And movies, I research them all.

subtitles.original: SNS見るたびに イイネ押すの アピールだよ
subtitles.english: Every time I see your SNS, I press Like. It's an appeal!

subtitles.original: 四六時中キミのこと考えて
subtitles.english: Thinking about you 24/7,

subtitles.original: 妄想しながら枕ギュってした
subtitles.english: I hugged my pillow while fantasizing.

subtitles.original: 明日はどんな服着ていこうかな
subtitles.english: What kind of clothes should I wear tomorrow?

subtitles.original: キミ想うだけでなんか照れる
subtitles.english: Just thinking of you makes me blush.

subtitles.original: キミの名前を呼べば
subtitles.english: If I call your name,

subtitles.original: ただそれだけでも Dreaming Dreaming
subtitles.english: Just that alone makes me Dreaming Dreaming.

subtitles.original: 溺れそうな私を
subtitles.english: Me, who is about to drown,

subtitles.original: 助け出して
subtitles.english: Rescue me.

subtitles.original: キミにFall in love 恋のSOS
subtitles.english: Falling in love with you, SOS of love.

subtitles.original: ずっと胸が苦しいんです ハヤクRescue
subtitles.english: My chest has been aching, quickly Rescue me.

subtitles.original: 「好き」のテレパシーに早く気づいて！
subtitles.english: Notice my telepathy of 'love' quickly!

subtitles.original: これはFall in love 恋のSOS
subtitles.english: This is falling in love, SOS of love.

subtitles.original: もっとキミに近づきたい
subtitles.english: I want to get closer to you.

subtitles.original: 終わらせて 片想いMy heart
subtitles.english: End this unrequited love, My heart,

subtitles.original: 全部抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embrace it all.

subtitles.original: 生まれたてのトキメキを響かせよう
subtitles.english: Let's make this brand new excitement resound.

subtitles.original: 最高の時間 最高の仲間と
subtitles.english: With the best time and the best friends.

subtitles.original: キラメキに乗って
subtitles.english: Ride on the sparkles.

subtitles.original: 覚えてるかな？ 最初の歌
subtitles.english: Do you remember? Our first song.

subtitles.original: 私の声が震えていた
subtitles.english: My voice was trembling.

subtitles.original: あの日から続く未来は
subtitles.english: The future that has continued since that day,

subtitles.original: みんなと掴んだ今日だよ
subtitles.english: Is today, which we grasped together with everyone.

subtitles.original: もっともっともっともっと
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more,

subtitles.original: 加速するハート
subtitles.english: My accelerating heart.

subtitles.original: 一緒に行くよどこまでも
subtitles.english: I'll go with you, anywhere.

subtitles.original: 準備はOK？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: ひらけ 夢のトビラを
subtitles.english: Open up! The door to dreams!

subtitles.original: キラメキライダー
subtitles.english: Kirameki Rider.

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はギュッと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our joined hands tightly without letting go.

subtitles.original: ひとり違う 描き出すトキメキ
subtitles.english: Each of us sketches a different excitement.

subtitles.original: 振り向くことなくまっすぐに
subtitles.english: Without looking back, straight ahead,

subtitles.original: 行くよ 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, to the dreaming sky.

subtitles.original: 笑い合ったことや
subtitles.english: The things we laughed about together,

subtitles.original: 尽きそうにない話題
subtitles.english: Topics that never seem to run out,

subtitles.original: 思い出いっぱいなのに
subtitles.english: Even though we have so many memories...
